entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is depriving Harry of his rights and freedoms.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: The school where Harry and other students are learning magic.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather, a wizard who is in hiding.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: A broomstick that Harry uses for Quidditch.

entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: A sport played by wizards on broomsticks.

entities.name: zacharias smith
entities.description: A member of Dumbledore's Army who is initially reluctant to participate.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A member of Dumbledore's Army who is motivated by the news of his parents' attacker's escape.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: A Death Eater and torturer who has escaped from prison.

entities.name: d.a.
entities.description: Dumbledore's Army, a group of students fighting against the Dark Lord.

entities.name: st. mungo's
entities.description: A hospital for magical creatures and wizards.

relationships.description: Harry is opposed to Umbridge's actions at Hogwarts.
Harry's godfather, Sirius, is a family member who is in hiding.
Harry participates in Quidditch as a student at Hogwarts.
Zacharias Smith is a member of Dumbledore's Army.
Neville is a member of Dumbledore's Army.
Bellatrix is a Death Eater and torturer who has escaped from prison.
Neville is friends with Harry, as evidenced by their meeting in St. Mungo's.
Bellatrix is a Death Eater and torturer who has escaped from prison.
Harry visited St. Mungo's hospital with Ron and Hermione.
